page.title: 08Dale C.P. School
page.content: Our school is a junior and infant school;the children come when they are 4 and leave when they are 11.There are 2 classes.There are 16 children in the top class and 15 in the bottom.We have got a new P.E. teacher and a new teacher in the bottom class.We learn Maths.,Reading,Writing and English.We have got two classrooms which are temporary wooden buildings.We used to have 3 but we made the first one into a dinner hall.The hall is 110 years old and is made of old red sandstone. We have also got a playground and a school field,but in the winter we cannot go in the field.Of the 31 children in our school,17 come by bus from Marloes,2 miles away, and 14 come from Dale.Sometimes we go on trips to do fieldwork.(We have learned about boat moorings,animals in the sea and about Carew Castle in this way).
